name: ACTPOHOB 4
description:
A game we made in 3 days for My First Game Jam 2017.

A-D: Movement
W or Space: Jump
Mouse: Aim
Left Click: Shoot
Right Click: Teleport (use with care)
R: Restart
Esc: Pause
Alt+Enter: Fullscreen (recommended if it works)

Pavlo (@pvvvlo) - Game design, code.
Bnktop (@bnktp, @_bnktop) - Art, game design.
Ingala (@ingala.sy) - Music.
F&StillAlive (@f.andstillalive) - Sound design.

Soundtrack is Deathdealer by Ingala (@ingala.sy).
